data.name: 112 Operator - Masks - CHARITY DLC
data.detailed_description:
CHARITY DLC - 100% of the publisher's proceeds will be donated to Emergency Services for protective gear.


Having this DLC enables masks on all your team members, protecting them and their patients from infections.
data.about_the_game:

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
